articles.author: Yushi Nohara
articles.title: July 2022 EMUI update reaches Huawei P50 Pocket (Global) - HC Newsroom
articles.description: The clamshell-designed Huawei P50 Pocket foldable started receiving the July 2022 EMUI security patch update in the West Europe and France market. The update aims to boost the security of the device in all aspects. Huawei’s multi-dimensional hinge foldable sm…
articles.content:
Last year Huawei announced EMUI 12 for older devices. The list was quite big but we became more interested after checking the inclusion of the Huawei P20 and Mate 10 series in the upgrade campaign.

articles.title: How Malaysia ended up owing RM57b to a sultan's heirs - Malaysiakini

articles.content: Malaysia is scrambling to protect its assets as the descendants of the last sultan of the remote Philippine region of Sulu look to enforce a U$15 billion (RM67 billion) arbitration award in a dispute… [+5866 chars]
